name: bqg-be
description: - Configure APIG, CDN, and ELB to work autonomously     - Setup REST-APIs with RDS for CRUDing user-profile data - Setup ModelArts(MindSpore and Google BERT) for training    - Setup OBS and Octoparse(alongside APIG) to: connect with MyFitnessPal API & MyFoodFacts API, and parse through WebMD & Mayo Clinic - Setup CSS to fetch and index  whatever is in the RDS and OBS (idk how to do this) - Set up DLI: Decide on what kind of data to monitor and how to translate that data into valuable insights on trends and/or threats.   - OBS should be storing multiple logs for DLI to work with

scripts.rebuild: ollama rm bqg && ollama create bqg -f ./modelfile.txt && ollama run bqg && clear
